intro: Anchusa officinalis f. roseiflora, commonly known as the rose-flowered honesty, is a flowering plant belonging to the Boraginaceae family. It is characterized by its showy, pink to lavender-colored flowers that bloom in summer, adding ornamental value to gardens. The plant typically grows to a height of 30–60 cm, featuring upright stems and lance-shaped leaves. It thrives in full sun and well-drained soil, making it suitable for rock gardens or borders. Its common name reflects the delicate, rose-like appearance of its blooms.
